targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" =~ /^$INTL_NUMBER_OF_MEASUREMENTS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" =~ /^$INTL_TIME_SENDING_MS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count(/^[A-Z].*/) FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Sensirion SPS30 Errors') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("string") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "key"
SELECT distinct("string") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "key"
SELECT distinct("string") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "key"
SELECT distinct("Hardware Watchdog") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT distinct("Software/System restart") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT distinct("Deep-Sleep Wake") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT distinct("Software Watchdog") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT distinct("Unknown") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = node WHERE (_name =~ /^$Measurement$/)
list.name: Node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = node WHERE (_name =~ /^$Measurement$/)
